action.description: The committee on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Takayama, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Chun, Marten, Takenouchi; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Amato, Olds; 2 Noes: Representative(s) Alcos, Garcia; and  Excused: none.
